name: Kart Unleashed
description:
Part of KenneyJam 2019

The Goal is to destroy the city during the 3 laps of the AI Karts

Controls 

WASDGamepad Left ThumbstickMoveSpacebar
AJumpQYReturn to Normal RotationTabInsert/SelectReset PositionLeft ShiftBBoostESC/PStartQuit Game

Kenney Assets Use:

  • RacingKit
  • UIpack
  • Modular Buildings
  • Jumperpack
  • Voiceover Fighters
  • Animal pack Redux
  • Font Pack
